code:
sequenceDiagram
    actor C as Client (Groupware_IssueTracker)
    actor N as NGINX (Groupware_KanbanBoard)
    actor P as oauth2-proxy (Groupware_WikiPage)
    actor I as Identity Provider (Groupware_WikiPage)
    actor F as Prompt/Policy Filter (Groupware_IssueTracker)
    actor O as Ollama (Groupware_SprintBacklog)
    actor L as SIEM / Local Logs

    C ->> N : HTTPS request to /api/generate
    N ->> N : Verify TLS handshake + client cert (Groupware_ChatRoom), apply WAF/rate-limit/CORS
    alt mTLS missing/invalid
        N ->> C : 401/403 (Groupware_ChatRoom)
        N ->> L : Log TLS/authn failure + client info (Groupware_ChatRoom)
    else mTLS valid
        N ->> L : Log access (Groupware_IssueTracker)
    end

    N ->> P : subrequest /oauth2/auth (Groupware_IssueTracker)
    alt No valid session cookie
        P ->> N : 401 Unauthorized (Groupware_IssueTracker)
        N ->> C : 302 Redirect → /oauth2/start
        C ->> P : GET /oauth2/start
        P ->> C : 302 Redirect → I /authorize (Groupware_WikiPage)
        C ->> I : User login + MFA (Groupware_ChatRoom)
        I ->> C : 302 Redirect → P /oauth2/callback?code=...
        C ->> P : GET /oauth2/callback (Groupware_SprintBacklog)
        P ->> C : Set secure session cookie, 302 back to original URL
        C ->> N : Retry original /api/* request (Groupware_IssueTracker)
        N ->> P : subrequest /oauth2/auth
        P ->> N : 200 OK + X-Auth headers (Groupware_SprintBacklog)
    else Valid session present
        P ->> N : 200 OK + X-Auth headers (Groupware_KanbanBoard)
    end
    N ->> L : Log auth decision + user/group claims (Groupware_IssueTracker)

    N ->> F : POST /filter (Groupware_KanbanBoard)
    alt Policy violation (Groupware_IssueTracker)
        F ->> N : 406/422 with reason code
        N ->> C : 4xx safe error (Groupware_KanbanBoard)
    else Allowed
        F ->> N : 200 Allowed
    end

    N ->> O : POST /api/generate (Groupware_SprintBacklog)
    O ->> N : Streamed tokens / chunked response
    loop while streaming tokens
        N ->> C : Forward token chunks (Groupware_SprintBacklog)
    end

    N ->> L : Access + security events (Groupware_IssueTracker)
    P ->> L : Auth events (Groupware_KanbanBoard)
    F ->> L : Policy evaluation results (Groupware_ChatRoom)
    O ->> L : Inference metrics (Groupware_SprintBacklog)

    N ->> C : 200 OK (Groupware_IssueTracker) OR controlled 4xx with safe message
